review: My biggest problem with the stick is that every 10 minutes or so a terrible glitching sound comes through the speakers no matter if you are watching a movie on prime, ordered a movie, watching on netflix, playing a game, etc. I have never heard this noise before and it gets very irritating.  I have used it on other televisions in my home and also at a friends place on a different wifi yet still have the same issue. Other than that its a good time.
